long_description: The REI Quantum Tablet pack fits a tablet or most 13 - 14 in. laptops in a dedicated padded pocket and organizes other daily necessities. It offers a comfortable carry square on your back. Dedicated laptop/tablet pocket is accessed through a side zipper and it's raised off the ground for extra protection when you set down your pack. Main pocket in the REI Quantum Tablet pack includes an open-top mesh pocket that will fit a 1-liter water bottle. Fully featured front organizer pocket holds pens, electronics and small essentials; key clip. Front zip quick-access pocket holds small items. Shoulder harness with ergonomic contours provides comfort and great fit; also includes a top grab handle. Coated, water-resistant Cordura(R) nylon fabric offers superior abrasion resistance and tear strength; padded bottom helps protect contents. Reflective trim enhances visibility in dusk/dark conditions; web loop holds blinky light (sold separately).
short_description: The REI Quantum Tablet pack fits a tablet or most 13 - 14 in. laptops in a dedicated padded pocket and organizes other daily necessities. It offers a comfortable carry square on your back.
